name: WAVIOLENCE
description:
Created for Global Game Jam 2017 in The GameIS Humongous Israeli Site, Old Jaffa. This game is buggy as hell and very stupid.

YOUR NAME IS [REDACTED] COOLASS.

YOUR MISSION: FIND THE MCGUFFIN AND STEAL IT. YOU ARE EQUIPPED WITH THE POWER OF HAND WAVES. GOOD LUCK.

This jam prototype/game thing includes one (very buggy and short) level. You can beat it without taking a single life. You can beat it after killing everyone. You can be stealthy. You can run around like it's Hotline Miami. The choice is yours.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Right Mouse Button (hold) - Holster/Unholster Hand

Left Mouse Button - Fire (if hand is unholstered)

C/CTRL - Crouch

Shift - Run
